Flow.description: Added Supported TA Notes to Safe Spaces Defaulted Indirect Hours and Minutes to 0 and removed Mandatory

formulas.name: ContactMethod
formulas.expression: IF({!OutcomeOfVisit} == {!ChoiceNoShow},"Cancelled / No Show", IF({!OutcomeOfVisit} == {!ChoiceCancelled},"Cancelled / No Show", IF(ISPICKVAL({!Session.Service_Setting__c}, "CLRES"),"Home Visit", "Face to Face")))

Flow.label: SafeSpace v2 - Post Visit

fields.name: NotSafeSpaceSessionText
fields.fieldText:
Safe Space - Error

Sorry, this doesn't look like a Safe Space Session

fields.name: PostVisitText
fields.fieldText:
Safe Space - Post Visit Identified Risks

Visit Date/Time: {!Session.Start_Date_Time__c}


What was the outcome of the visit?

fields.name: Case_Note_Contains_Medical_Information
fields.helpText: Check this if the case note contains medical information.

fields.name: Hours
fields.helpText: Did the outreach visit extend the original duration? If so adjust the total amount of hours here

fields.name: Minutes
fields.helpText: Did the outreach visit extend the original duration? If so adjust the total amount of minutes here

fields.name: ProcessCompleteText
fields.fieldText:
Process Complete


The Post-Visit Assessment is complete.


You may now close this screen by pressing Finish

textTemplates.name: SupportedTANote
textTemplates.text:
Acronyms 

Homes NSW (HNSW) |  Link to Home (L2H)  

  

  

Presentation: What did you observe & hear? What did they report? How was their mood, affect and engagement?  

 

  

Assessment: What was the presenting issue? What has the participant tried to address? What has worked or not worked?  

 

  

Risk: What is the current risk status of the Participant. Where and what have you reported to whom?  

 

  

Intervention: What interventions did you use? What intervention is working for the participant?  

 

  

Referrals: Who did you make the referral to? Where did you refer them to? Why was the referral made, and when will you follow up? 

  

  

Plan: When is the next appointment? What are the participants’ goals and strategies? What actions/tasks did you and the participant agree on?
